website_summaries.verdict: Its simplistic controls and user-friendly features make it another nice option for first-time drone fliers, but veterans will have a blast with the DROCON once they disable the “training wheel modes.”
pros: View and record live camera footage via Apple and Android devices
Drone returns to pilot at the press of a button
cons: This drone’s 640 x 480p resolution is on the lower side, but it’s passable

customer_reviews.title: I love this drone!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 79 year old father and this is what he had to say...What I love the most is that is has "automatic" return...No worries if its going to come back!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather De Marco

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great to fly clean camera and easy to use great bringer drone very agile and handles outstanding
customer_reviews.author: Akeem Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to control, camera wouldn't connect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the drone to take photos and video of an outdoor birthday party. Three adults (one an electrical engineer) attempted to connect the camera on the drone with three different types of phones with no luck. Two adults and a teenager only succeeded in flying the drone, not very well, for short periods of time. The stability of flight was poor, which ended up not really mattering due to the inability to take pictures. Unfortunately, it was a waste of $60.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Howland

customer_reviews.title: Drone - 5/5 Star easy beginner drone!
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s a really good beginner drone to start out with, and it comes with many good features and the staff is really helpful and kind at DROCON, like John, the agent I spoke to who was kind and helping when I asked him questions about my drone.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A Hill

customer_reviews.title: Fun stuff
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome! It was like xmas morning when i fired this bad boy up. It was easy to use and i am stoked. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of the throttle. I ordered it after the good reviews but know its limits.
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson owned it for less than 2 minutes. It went straight up where the wind caught it and it was gone. We all tried looking for it and my husband went back at night to try to see the light from it but no luck. So we didn't get a chance to enjoy it. My husband has a Mavic Pro and knows how to drone but this little one has a very sticky throttle so it just took off too fast for our 9 year old grandson though he has actually flown my husbands drone.
customer_reviews.author: Gina D

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: So the battery last like max 10 mins, imagine 5 ppl playing with only for it to just stop. Easy to use without instructions cause who has time if my 6 year cousin can then everyone can, did not get the phone holder and contacted Amazon who promised a refund without return then say they did not So the battery only last 10 mins Max as stated by the manufacturer who also promised a replacement battery as shown on the papers in the box and I did everything they requested and they did not even respond when I contacted them about this
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: camera afixed onto  the drone specificlly, or exactly, and not purporting to have this feature
customer_reviews.text: In the listing, it purports this drone can take photos; even depicts a camera image on the box, however the narrative does not specifically state in plain and simple English, that the recipient will have to affix an App, or other connecting device to take and record pictures. There is some means to connect from the drone to the controller's App, but you cannot take and record photos or pics, without being aided by an All. The seller needs to state:" An App. will be an imperative attachment, before any pictures can be performed.
customer_reviews.author: repenting sinner

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed, and hate the assembly.
customer_reviews.text: No instructions included,so you have to figure it out by downloading a program online. Tiny screws that hold blades and bumpers on fall out repeatedly. PHOTOs show a Holder for cell phone, but my remote has none.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Atrocious battery life and nonexistent customer support.
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasts 9:57 after 24 hours charging. It’s easy enough to control, although it’s so light it doesn’t handle any breeze at all very well. Zero support. Facebook page is never replied to, Facebook messages are never marked “seen”. Emails are not replied to. Chat on the website gives a fake message from “Tina” that she’s helping someone else and will be right with you... and sits there. I don’t expect much for $55. But I expected more than this.
customer_reviews.author: Derek A. Wade

customer_reviews.title: Bargain Price Beginner Drone with FPV
customer_reviews.text: For the price paid, it is good value. You have to realize this is NOT a $800 DJI drone with optical sensors, GPS, altimeters, 4K camera with gimbal. This is an introductory level drone to get your feet wet in the hobby and it does it well for a great price point. The drone is plenty fast and agile for a beginner/intermediate. Video is a bit grainy, but is expected at this price point. Wifi FPV seemed to work well in the range I was in. There are trim functions to help with stabilization. Flight time is as advertised....Approx. 8-9 min. The app is basic but it does what it is supposed to (record video, take pics, live FPV).
customer_reviews.author: ER Doc

customer_reviews.title: he loved it for a moment...
customer_reviews.text: Okay - I knew my 10 yr old grandson was going to need a lot of supervision and practice to learn this drone. It was fairly rated for someone over 14. We followed all assembly instructions and read all the material carefully. I quizzed him over and over on the functionality of each button. He loved it until a gust of wind took it further then expected. The return/home button did not work. Our new drone is lost somewhere in the pasture. It was a great price but next time I will pay the extra money for some sort of location tracking.
customer_reviews.author: Angela T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: This drone is great for the value. My husband and 15 year old enjoy playing with it. Assembly was easy and already comes with all the tools you need! I like that it has a rechargeable battery and replacement parts and a small screwdriver was even included. The app was also easy to install and it comes with a holder for the phone. The HD camera is awesome and you can see everything clearly. You can easily record and take pictures via the app. Overall easy to maneuver and perfect for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: Jen88

customer_reviews.title: Good company fun item but sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Got this for dad for Father’s Day. He lives playing with it but the first one got taken by the heavens within minutes of me gifting it to him. The company and amazon were great about replacing it however. It might be beginners ignorance but it seems hard to control the drone and takes off with barely a whisper of a touch on the control and doesn’t respond well once up high which also doesn’t take long at all. Dad reports it’s a bit easier after some practice on the replacement but not much. He still lives it though.
customer_reviews.author: Catluvx2

customer_reviews.title: Great value for an amazingly capable craft.
customer_reviews.text: We've been flying for two days, and it's been more and more fun with each flight. Still tons of features to learn and explore beyond just the basics, especially with the "Control" part of the app. Only two minor drawbacks. We already lost two anti-vibration pads (part number 708009) and could not find details about the features of the app in it's help menu. I intend to make this a 5-star review after working through these couple things with DROCON customer service. I anticipate they will be very responsive and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Mom in DC

customer_reviews.title: great value and good battery life
customer_reviews.text: probably the best drone with a camera you'll be able to find for this price point. for the app, remember to connect to the drone. I read a lot of bad reviews for the app and the users aren't properly connecting to the drone and instead are on their home wifi. haven't tested the limits on range yet, but will be doing that soon. camera quality could be better, but that would drive the price up.
customer_reviews.author: AppreneurFI

customer_reviews.title: Return to Home did not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas, and a week ago while flying, he went a little high, and lost control of the drone. When he hit the return to home button on the controller, it did nothing, kept flying away. So now he has no drone/christmas present, and I'm out $50. I'd recommend the Parrot Bebop 2, even for a beginner. Yes, it's $130 more, but it is SUCH a good drone! AND THE RETURN TO HOME WORKS on the Bebop 2!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Nolasco

customer_reviews.title: Directions were easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: The little Drone is surprisingly stable in flight and hovering, but my landings were a little rough which tells me I'll need some more practice. I did not have time to download the app for my android phone so I was unable to check out the camera. If anyone is interested in learning how to fly a drone this is an inexpensive way to do it, why take the risk of damaging a big expensive drone learning how to operate it?
customer_reviews.author: john dragon

customer_reviews.title: Durable as they come.
customer_reviews.text: The app shows all four control modes but won’t control your drone. The controller it comes with only does mode 2, and I’d really like to be able to use mode 4. However, I’ve literally beat the hell out of this thing and it’s still going. Live video is too laggy to truly do FPV, but the drone gives you want you need to learn the basics. For the price, it’s great but get a couple extra batteries because you’ll want to fly it more. And it’s nearly indestructible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have.
customer_reviews.text: Was totally happy with this quad. It handles the wind very well and the camora to phone screen looks great. For the price, your getting a steal. Plan to order a couple more as gifts for my grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: Ric K

customer_reviews.title: Great value ! Whole new perspective
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted to fly my own drone after watching other ppl using it in the park or on the beach. It is so cool to be able to “see” and document things in a total different perspective! This drone comes in a nice box with all the components you need and detailed instructions! Great value for this price point for sure if you don’t wanna splurge on your very first drone like me :)
customer_reviews.author: CeCe

customer_reviews.title: Easy for someone who has flown before
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 11 yo son for his birthday. He has had other, smaller drones so this one was very easy for him to fly. I bought it because he wanted one with camera capability and he has loved that option. So far the app has been easy to use! All in all, he has loved this present!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah D.

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with the handling, battery life, and durability
customer_reviews.text: It is a great size for learning to fly a drone. This is my second one which says how satisfied I am with it. I lost the first one by flying in too much wind and too close to a tree; it is now a tree ornament. Adjusting the trim before each flight makes all the difference. Mine has handled many crashes and tree limbs without breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Krisocrat

customer_reviews.title: Good recreational purpose drone!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks like toothless, This is a good value for money drone that can be used by beginners. Drone is light weight and response wrt to remote is good. having more battery backup could've been a plus point, but not gonna complain on it looking at the $ I spent on it. I would strongly recommend to go over the operation manual before a beginner start flying the drone. Labels for controls on the remote could help in using and operating the controller in a quicker way. Overall I would give a 4 ish rating out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: hemanth

customer_reviews.title: This is a good one to learn with.
customer_reviews.text: My son has loved this, I have 2 recommendations: increase the flying time battery life. 6-8 mins of continuous flight time is rather short. And make sure the screwdriver you included is actually small enough to use on the screws during installation of the blade guards. It’s great that it’s a magnetic screwdriver but it was too big to actually use.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Siviglia

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It worked great use in a big field while learning so you don’t accidentally hit someone’s car lol. Flew smoothly and has great handling even with the worst of flyers
customer_reviews.author: Linz

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Would love to give a 5 star review but unfortunately we got a defective product. It quit working within the first day. However, the customer service has been amazing and we are supposed to be getting a replacement. Once we get the replacement I will absolutely be updating my review based on that.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa O

customer_reviews.title: A great drone for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is a great drone for beginners. Its pretty easy to control, the controls are intuitive, and its a great price. This is the first drone ive ever owned and it has been great so far. I had a couple issues in the first couple days (entirely operator errors lol) and had to contact customer service. The customer service department responded on a Sunday and were extremely understanding and helpful. Resolved my issue better than i could have expected. I absolutely reccomend this drone for a beginner. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: matthew O'Malley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drone for beginners like me!
customer_reviews.text: After recent storms hit, I was able to use this drone to survey any roof issues that I may have received. For being the first time using it, I was able to maneuver it very easily. Battery life (flying time) and distance you can travel isn't that long or far, but to be fair, this is for beginners like myself. The linking to your phone was very easy and is awesome to watch your flying (or crash landing) on a livee video feed. I highly recommend this drone for anyone who is wanting to start and get some experience. Footnote, no damage to my roof!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Durbec

customer_reviews.title: First time experience will be a great one!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best drone of this class if tried so far!! I've got fast drones ,big drones, GPS drones...the list goes on but I always come back to the good old cyclone!! For showing someone or letting them test a drone for the first time you want them to enjoy the experience, this is the one I go to.. Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good drone - atrocious battery time
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it long enough to attest to it's durability, but I was really impressed initially with its design and function. The BATTERY is AWFUL! A single charge only lasts for roughly 6-8 minutes of flight time. I deleted the battery on its initial run and charged it fully - that's the best she can muster. Well have to buy additional batteries. Gonna see how she holds up in some more rigorous tests and will update later if need be.
customer_reviews.author: R K

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and easy to fly.
customer_reviews.text: This drone was quite easy to assemble and set up, including connection via WiFi to an older cell phne using the DROCON android app. It seems fairly easy to fly, although we only tried for a little while as it was too breezy the day we got it and tried it out in our front yard, so will have to try again on a calmer day and in a larger area like the local HS soccer field or park.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Drone for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great To Learn About The Basics of "Drone Flying" To All Those Purchase This product be Patient and read the instructions on how to use the product It'll be better experience for you later
customer_reviews.author: Type6

customer_reviews.title: lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great first drone!! My 9 year old and 7 year old both had a blast! Update.. Drone crashed and had to reach out for customer support. We spoke with a specialist named Edward that was fantastic! The product and support team are enough to make me buy this product again!!
customer_reviews.author: Suki153

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing positive about this product. Not sure if I bought a dud; but picture was terrible. In any distance did any picture come out visible. Cheap plastic blades broke or fell off with the slightest wind, drag, etc. Was buying a beginner drone for my sons birthday, so was not expecting much; but wouldn’t even take this if it was free. Had to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Don Klaben

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BEGINNER DRONE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Beginner Drone!! Works great and comes with a camera on it that you can see from your iPhone. Great for newbies such as myself since I have always wanted to try them but didn't want to spend $400+ on one. Only thing I would say is to make sure you have another battery since they only last about 6-10 min. Customer support is great as well since the respond back quickly and are very helpful. Highly recommend this for anyone who wants to start out with flying Drones.
customer_reviews.author: Scott U.

customer_reviews.title: Fun cheap drone
customer_reviews.text: Fun drone to play with. The controls are a bit touchy so it takes a bit to get used to flying it. I recommend starting in a large open area to avoid getting it stuck in a tree like I did. Battery life is only about 10-15 min. It took a while to figure out getting the camera to live feed to my phone even following the directions. Finally worked after I disabled cell data on my phone. Over all, it is a decent done for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Simeon DiGennaro

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third toy-grade drone, and by far the best. Easy to fly and fun. Very maneuverable and agile. Can do amazing, multiple flips and, with a little practice, you can do amazing aerobatics. Try cutting power during a high flip, then going full power as it falls. Looks cool. Very durable. Batteries are cheap. Highly recommended! Excellent customer service. I had a problem with the wifi from the drone dropping out, so they're sending me a replacement. Vina was a knowledgeable and helpful customer representative.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C.

customer_reviews.title: For all ages
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters 7th birthday and she loves it. She got it going with no problem and lands it like a pro. Her 13 yr old brother and her dad also are enjoying it. I read the reviews before I purchased this drone and I am glad I did. Great present for anyone, young or old.
customer_reviews.author: C Ja

customer_reviews.title: Fun drone
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun drone and for the price I think it was a good deal. As long as there was no wind I could fly it outside. I had a tendency to fly it to the limits of distance and lost it several times. It was sure a fun drone on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: READ THE INSTRUCTIONS!
customer_reviews.text: I have never flown a drone before so I am learning. This drone has a simple setup and am already getting the hang of it. Thank you for building such an outstanding flying machine!
customer_reviews.author: Mary W.

customer_reviews.title: replacements shields are impossible to find
customer_reviews.text: We flew it successfully a few times, but one of the shields broke, so we searched and searched with no luck finding new shields, even when the product description said it would fit this model. THEN I EVEN CALLED THE MANUFACTURER and they pointed me to what they said WOULD fit.....and the new shields didn't. NOT EVEN CLOSE. Its comical how oversized they were Don't buy this. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Easy control beginner quadcopter
customer_reviews.text: Both the headless mode and one-key return are most helpful features for beginners. Still took some learning curve to be proficient though. Connection to smart phone was relatively easy. Battery life is short so getting spares is recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dēmētrios the Quality Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The drone is great! Easy to connect to your phone and assembly. We had one little issue when the drone caught the wind and we lost control and unfortunately lost the drone altogether. But thankfully DROCON’s customer service is so great they were able to send us a replacement! Besides our little hiccup overall a great product and great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this in person and warnty
customer_reviews.text: It worked but one of the motors wasn't working out of the four it has. Had return it all did was offer refund even though I wanted it replaced. It was third party so they couldn't it was a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 1st drone
customer_reviews.text: I love the smooth operation of the drone once you get used to the controls. I am a beginner and I'm learning a drone for the first time. And although it has gone into the tree and into the field a few times we've always been able to retrieve it. I especially love how sturdy it is built and can easily take multiple crashings :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jason C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drone for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to fly. Very light gets taken by 2mph winds easily. Needs a larger battery in my opinion. About 15 minutes fly time without camera and Wi-Fi running. 5 minutes with. Still 1.5hr charge time makes up for it. Great customer service. Warranty immediately!!! Bonus items. Will purchase from them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to Learn!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drone for my son and when we got it, he was able to set it up very easily. It comes with a lot of spare parts and the packaging is straightforward and organized. Based off of other reviews, this seemed like a really great drone and I can agree it is. This is simple to learn for beginners and offers a great camera for its price. I would definitely recommend if you want to try flying drones for the first time!
customer_reviews.author: Pink Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great 1st drone
customer_reviews.text: Great drone for a beginner. Bought this one because I wanted a drone with a camera but wasn't ready to commit to a professional grade drone. The camera is pretty good especially considering the price and the controls seem pretty responsive. Has good battery life and has good propeller guards which are good for when you accidentally fly into something.
customer_reviews.author: BooBoo103

customer_reviews.title: Great for a first-timer
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 9yo and he loves it so far. I had a little trouble attaching one of the propeller guards but I eventually figured it out. It has a good flight time and he go one flip on the flight before we needed to recharge the battery. It is easy to control and fun to fly. I have not yet been able to connect the drone to his phone yet but we will keep trying. All and all he is loving it and that is what really matters.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. Avila

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This drone it's super easy to control. It's great for beginners and I'm really surprised with the quality in general (the camera have a very good quality too). It comes with multiple replacements, so you don't have to worry in case of some accident. It have so many accessories and also you can control it from your phone, you just have to download the app. I give it 10/10 because it's not expensive, goes beyond expectations and it works perfectly. It's a great opportunity.
customer_reviews.author: Perla Sauceda

customer_reviews.title: Fun entry-level drone
customer_reviews.text: Engineered very well. Flies well. It does take some getting used to. If there was any suggestion, it would be to perhaps make the front of the drone somewhat more pronounced, so we know what direction the front is. But the picture quality is great, and it is a lot of fun to fly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great drone for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift. The recipient loves it. We wish it had a longer batter life when charged, but other than that it's great. It seems to be pretty durable. We have not used the camera yet, so can not comment on the camera quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great drone for kids with a little flying experience!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5 year olds 4th drone. I did not pay close enough attention to the dimensions when i placed the order and was surprised by the size when it arrived. However, this has been the best drone purchase to date.! He loves the quality of the video and ease of using the app. Drone battery life is excellent with nice range. The body has been quite durable. Had an issue with wiring but a quick chat with customer service initiated a replacement at no cost!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so gun. I bought this for myself as a gift. It flew so hi and far. I thought I had lost it..... The best thing is that it returned to me, and I have no clue how!! That was awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a day. This is good for a kid learning how to maneuver a drone for the first time. Easy to assemble, battery lasts longer than advertised (first session was 30 mins). Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: andre

customer_reviews.title: Great product.. !!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use.. we have never had a drone before. Very good quality and easy to use for someone starting out. Customer Service has been really good too! My husband and almost 10 yr old daughter LOVED it.. she cannot get enough of it.
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Too much performane for a 7 year old boy.
customer_reviews.text: May be for beginners, but not for a 7-8 year old boy's first flying experience. Eventually Charlie Brown's 'kite eating tree' did it's thing. It does fly very well, but too much performance for a first flying experience.
customer_reviews.author: k. mike clark

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my 7 year old. He loves it. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: ariesgrl

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to control. Have to use in a football field not to loose it.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Great reviews; let's confirm them!
customer_reviews.text: I hope to use this as a stepping-stone into my new aerial photography career. I certainly have a tremendous amount of flight training to do (including the FAA Part 107 cert), then, honestly, I'll have to jump up to the next level of drones. The reviews lead you to believe that this drone is a great entry-level flyer; we'll see! Oh, thanks to Amazon for a very quick 2 day delivery here in the N. Atlanta area! I was in the back yard when the Amazon driver saw me-- he brought it to me!
customer_reviews.author: Miles J Wise

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to fly drone
customer_reviews.text: Having fun with my grandson. 1st drone for both of us. The company really stands behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Illas

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap. The thing just floated away. Remote control dont work for long distance. So if it gets too far it will just keep going. I saw it fly away til i couldnt see it no more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great drone, but short battery life
customer_reviews.text: This drone is great/ easy to use, lightweight, and a great camera. The only problem is the battery life is very short. So while it’s fun to use, you have to stop every hour or so to recharge it. Other than that, it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great Drone!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product at a great price!!👍 easy assembly. The battery takes about 90 minutes to fully charge, and once it’s charged it works like a charm. Not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Gotta luv this drone!
customer_reviews.text: What a blast! Okay, the first one is hanging in a tree, but I learned and am loving this drone. It's easy to learn and well built (I've crashed it often enough but have only lost a rubber foot!)
customer_reviews.author: John Reed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent beginner to mid-level drone
customer_reviews.text: So far this is the best drone we have bought for this price range. It's for beginner to mid-level player. Very easy to control. My favorite feature is the live video and in-app control. The quality of the video sending back is very good quality considering the price. My suggestion is to play it in wide open space and relatively soft surface.
customer_reviews.author: Lian

customer_reviews.title: Great for a very short time
customer_reviews.text: Fun little drone especially for beginners but range not to good and the battery life is very bad like 8 minutes maybe. Aslo take very long to charge
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Drone
customer_reviews.text: The purchase of this drone was a great idea for many reasons such as: being easy to fly, reasonably priced, user friendly functionality, and a great instructional manual. Also, DROCON has a team of excellent customer service representatives who are always available and ready to assist you with your needs/concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Larry H.

customer_reviews.title: Biggest Amazon disappointment ever!
customer_reviews.text: Almost impossible to balance still haven’t learned how to instructions were useless and the prop guards fall off and don’t screw in properly so had to glue the should have spent 200 more got a real drone
customer_reviews.author: randolph tashman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drone
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a perfect drone for beginners. All the controls work as they should and it flies great! Very fun drone to fly around.
customer_reviews.author: Mecebra

customer_reviews.title: Video quality
customer_reviews.text: After the kids spend 2 times practicing it, they seem to be able to handle it quite well. Pro: strong signal that can control at a decent distant. Con: the video is not that good.
customer_reviews.author: Kham T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My son is 9 and we got this for him for Christmas for his first drone and he has gotten it stuck many times in trees and it continues to work great!! He does have to use our phones sometimes if he wants to do other things with it but all in all, it’s great for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: NLaderer

customer_reviews.title: super basic drone
customer_reviews.text: the drone is super cheap, super light, but easy to use. its an ok deal. dont forget, money goes straight to china!
customer_reviews.author: Don Power

customer_reviews.title: So many features for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Its not as easy to fly as the reviews made it appear to be. I’m still learning though. It has a lot of cool features and I hope to learn them all soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Fleming

customer_reviews.title: One and done...
customer_reviews.text: My son received this as a Christmas gift. We went to an open field to fly it. Sure enough, it took on a life of it's own and flew off. I tried to chase it down but I couldn't keep up. Needless to say, he's devastated.
customer_reviews.author: carmen s.

customer_reviews.title: For beginners
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the product. While I am still learning to control it, I am happy that I can get it to get off the ground and hover for a bit. It is fairly easy to operate after you get used to the controls. Thank you creating one of these for beginners like me. While the controls are somewhat sensitive and very responsive, I am slowly, but surely, getting used to them. I only wish that the battery would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: The drone works very well for such a reasonable cost
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of use. It took a few minutes to add the propeller guards (definitely worth the time and money) and I was able to charge the battery and use the drone on the same night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little quadcopter. It's exactly as is described; a beginners model. It's super fun to fly without the worries of crashing an expensive drone. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ian S.

customer_reviews.title: DROCON X708 WITH WIFI AND HD CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: GREAT DRONE WELL BILT AND EASY TO FLY, ALSO DROCONS WARRANTY IS THE BEST! ANYONE WOULD HAVE A GOOD TIME FLYING THIS DRONE AND THE PRICE IS WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.author: Bill ZAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Assembly out of the box was very easy to put together. Once it was assembled, we took it outside to test it and we got the hang of using it within minutes. Very fun and durable. It makes a great gift for a beginner due to the durability of the product (there were many crashes along the way)! Overall I am happy with my purchase and love it! Only suggestion I would make is to purchase an extra battery as it only lasts around 8-10 minutes per charge.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good drone for kids
customer_reviews.text: Drone is good so far, but I dont like the fact that it is lagging to timely respond to controller. There is about a second lag when you try to add more throttle. Otherwise, we only used it inside and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Umidjon Yusupov

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars Except for Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: This is a great practice drone for the price. My only gripe is that I would have paid even more if it could give longer battery life. I ended up buying 2 more batteries which seem a little bit longer life maybe but not by much. Maybe it's just impossible and dropping a star for it is unfair, I couldn't drop a half star. But overall I feel this was the right choice for what I wanted and I have zero regrets. The YouTube reviews led me to a good drone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old bought this with his birthday money and is enjoying it
customer_reviews.author: idaho6

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Survives Mistakes of the Untrained User
customer_reviews.text: DROCON shows to withstand challenges from first learners. If the untrained user cannot handle it properly at first, it is so well made that it survives minor crashes easily. It almost teaches you how to handle it after trying it a couple of times. The controls are sensitive and respond very well. Once one learns how to handle and control it, it is a lot of fun and feels much better than cheaper more fragile models our there.
customer_reviews.author: Pei-Chun Lu

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Had fun playing with this! It’s easy for beginners with one key return! It’s so light and easy to control with remote! The app is also clear to watch real view and I can also record or take a picture! Value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Read the instruction manual fully before you fly
customer_reviews.text: First time I ever flew a drone. The battery life seemed good so far. I messed around for about 10 mins then let the drone get high and I lost control and it flew 1/2 mile away but was lucky it landed in someone's front yard. I am also struggling to get the app to work so you can use the camera but I only tried once.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Stever

customer_reviews.title: A1 Drocon, good
customer_reviews.text: Light, smaller, great first RC Quad copter. Smaller version of buggs 3 w/o huge, brushless motors.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew, says....

customer_reviews.title: Great drone for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The drone is a nice fit for me. ( a pre beginner, The Drocon CYCLONE Quad Copter is awesome fun and the craft is quite durable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Milanak

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This drone is vey easy to use. Install the battery, turn on the controller, and fly. Easy to pair with your phone so you can view and record the camera feed. Just wish the controller showed thrust percentage.
customer_reviews.author: Lanaya

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: Pros good first copter Cons Just 1 battery in packaging
customer_reviews.author: A. S. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent drone for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Looks well made for the price point. I have to use it longer to see if it’ll have any glitch or malfunction.
customer_reviews.author: nairdie81

customer_reviews.title: This is a very suitable UAV for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Very good UAV HD anti shake, very high cost performance, simple operation, high cost performance, very high function, very many HD anti shake photos, one button return, automatic return, very good appearance, exquisite and beautiful
customer_reviews.author: George Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Very cool!
customer_reviews.text: Gave as gift to my nephew that is 12 and he picked up quickly. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Not the best even for a beginner....
customer_reviews.text: The remote is really touchy, you barley tap it and it goes from 0 to 60 and hard to control. Within the first 20 minutes one of the propellers cracked.
customer_reviews.author: JBarr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beginner drone!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girl's little brother for his eleventh birthday. It came pre-charged and before it ran out of juice he was flying around the yard like a pro! With only an hour and a half charging time, he was back in business before I knew it. 10/10 recommend, by far the best drone I've seen in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: hWend7

customer_reviews.title: Works well, sturdy, lots of fun.
customer_reviews.text: As a toy for my 7-year-old grandson. Improves hand-eye coordination. Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: teacher

customer_reviews.title: Bullet Proof
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 4 of these. Very easy to fly. We race them in and around trees at full speed. As you can imagine we hit the trees. I mean repeatedly. Stood up better than the other Drones we were racing. They were 100 dollars. Very fun. They have longer life batteries, just look.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner drone
customer_reviews.text: Fun product. Easy to learn, lots of fun. Windy area, sometimes too windy for it. Lots of fun anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Jonny_K_79

customer_reviews.title: Will not pair and customer service is a joke
customer_reviews.text: This drone will not pair with an android phone to take pictures. The tech support was useless. The tech's response to our problem was "check the manual". DO NOT PURCHASE IF YOU HAVE AN ANDROID PHONE!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

product_meta.title: DROCON Drone for Beginners X708W Wi-Fi FPV Training Quadcopter with HD Camera Equipped with Headless Mode One Key Return Easy Operation
feature_bullets: ✈LIVE VIDEO DIRECT TO YOUR DEVICE✈: Thanks to the built-in live video HD camera, you’ll get a high-definition aerial view of your flight direct to your mobile device so you can view the amazing footage your drone captures.

✈REAL-TIME WI-FI TRANSMISSION✈: The real-time transmission is seamlessly transmitted over a stable 2.4GHz frequency. As the drone takes to the sky, watch the video on your mobile device and record video or take photos – even from a distance.

✈HEADLESS MODE & ONE-KEY RETURN✈: When the drone is flying in headless mode, simply press the one-key return button and the drone will fly back to you. With these functions, you can easily control this drone and you’ll never lose it.
✈IN-APP CONTROL✈: Install the iOS or Android app on your smartphone then connect to the drone via Wi-Fi to watch real-time video of your drone’s flight and share with friends.
✈360° 3D FLIP MODE✈: Press the function button and push the right-hand stick in any direction; the drone will flip accordingly. You can continuously perform these rolls for great action and fun.
